MILLERGROUP Intelligence, Inc.

When You Need Answers, We Find Them

Discreet investigations and professional process serving in Park City and throughout Utah, California, and Montana

Get a Confidential Consultation Our Services

Your Privacy. Your Peace of Mind. Our Priority.

For nearly 30 years, individuals throughout Park City, Summit County, and the Mountain West have trusted MILLERGROUP Intelligence when they need answers. Founded in 1995 by licensed private investigator Michael Miller, we understand that reaching out for help isn't easy—especially when it involves your personal life.

Whether you're facing suspicions in a relationship or need legal documents served reliably and discreetly, we're here to help with compassion, confidentiality, and local expertise you can count on.

How We Can Help You

Infidelity Investigations

If you suspect your partner isn't being faithful, you deserve to know the truth. We conduct discreet surveillance and provide clear, documented evidence—giving you the clarity you need to move forward with confidence.

Completely confidential. Your privacy is protected every step of the way.

Process Serving

Legal documents need to be served correctly—the first time. Our experienced team ensures your paperwork is delivered promptly and professionally throughout Park City, Summit County, Utah, California, and Montana.

Verified proof of service. Reliable documentation for your legal proceedings.

Additional Services for Your Protection

We also offer surveillance, background checks, safety consulting, and security assessments. View all services →
